ygData.subject: Re: Level times
ygData.msgSnippet: hehehe  I m in a Guild on Tarew Marr called Legacy =) ... From: Vegue, Tony 1047  To:  Sent: Wednesday, July 28,
ygData.messageBody:
hehehe I'm in a Guild on Tarew Marr called Legacy =)

----- Original Message -----
From: Vegue, Tony 1047 <tonyv@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 12:52 PM
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Level times


> From: "Vegue, Tony 1047" <tonyv@...>
>
> Hey! I remember you Tanis! You will remember me as Solomon Grundy,
> Muhamed, Condo Ron, Gozer...
>
> "Legacy Forever" -- hah!
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mark S. Foster [mailto:markf@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 5:15 AM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Level times
>
>
> From: "Mark S. Foster" <markf@...>
>
> If you played on 108, You might know me as Tanis, Sinatas, Rakasta =)
>
> Rakasta Drache'Morder
> Tarew Marr
> 31 Season Ranger
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Vegue, Tony 1047 <tonyv@...>
> To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 6:22 PM
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Level times
>
>
> > From: "Vegue, Tony 1047" <tonyv@...>
> >
> > What server did you play on in Meridian? I was on 108, and that was a
> > really great game.. but you are right, it got ruined. I think when they
> > made the spell class changes, it really went downhill from there. The
> older
> > chars were mage/tanks, and newer players would never be as powerful.
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: seekerslady@... [mailto:seekerslady@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 6:12 PM
> > To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Level times
> >
> >
> > From: seekerslady@...
> >
> > I used to play meridian 59. I loved this game but people got burned out
on
> > it becuase you could build too fast and then got bored. Then people went
> > around and PKed each other. It turned a wonderful online community into
a
> > garbage dump. What is your great hurry? You planning on leaving soon? As
> > long as you are having fun and meeting new people and playing a game you
> > like what difference does it make what level you are or how fast you get
> > there. These games are ment to be played for years not weeks. I am
> > surprised that people have already been able to max out. Now what do
they
> > have to do? Ok they can go anywhere and kill almost anything but how
long
> > before they get bored and move on? The game has only been out a few
> months.
> >
> > Just my 2 cents
> >
> > Feather Dreamwalker of Rathe
> > >
> > >I agree that level gaining is quite slow. 8-10 hours
> > >for a level is a bit much. I can't imagine the high
> > >30s and above.
> > >
> > >Belgarth
> > >
> >
> >
> >
